attributes.action: The UK Government should fund the cost of all PCR Covid Tests for UK Citizens
attributes.additional_details: The current cost of these PCR Covid Tests for anyone leaving or returning to the UK is very expensive, particularly for families, ranging from £70 to £120 per person. At the same time this will have a serious effect on the travel and airline industry. However it is also unfair as it is free in several other similar countries including France and Italy.
attributes.background: The UK Government should fund the cost of all PCR Covid 19 Tests for UK Citizens departing and arriving back in the UK so there is no cost.

rejection.details:
https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/575118

Travel and testing requirements for leaving the UK are a matter for the country of arrival.
